reviewText: Watched the first 2 episodes so far, the animal information is good, but the hosts act pretty cheesy, and I can't stand the sinner's prayer being pushed at the end of each episode. This is not found in God's Word- No examples of ever anyone saying a sinner's prayer for Salvation! Plus, kids are already in fellowship with God! Check the Bible out and see for yourself!

Excellent quality!  This show gives God the Glory for His creation in a fun way that any age will enjoy.  This is not a cartoon - it is real video footage of various wild and domesticated animals with biblically based information.  Great learning tool!

My 2 year old enjoys the animals and information in the video! Also love the biblical verses and prayers included!
Thank you
This is a really great video.  It is very educational, and my son loves it.  It was in perfect shape and shipped quickly.

This was disappointing.  It was purchased to use for a children's program as we begin a unit on creation.  The quality of the video is amateurish by today's standards.  Hopefully it will hold the interest of of the younger classes but we will need to find something else for the older kids.
